CustomField.formula:
if(MONTH(Disconnected_Program__c)>0,
((YEAR(Disconnected_Program__c) *12)+MONTH(Disconnected_Program__c))
+
( IF((MONTH (Disconnected_Program__c) = MONTH(Program_Start__c)),0,1) )
-
((YEAR(Program_Start__c) * 12) + MONTH(Program_Start__c))
,
((YEAR(Today()) *12)+MONTH(Today()))
+
( IF((MONTH (Today()) = MONTH(Program_Start__c)),0,1) )
-
((YEAR(Program_Start__c) * 12) + MONTH(Program_Start__c))
)
CustomField.label: Months on aXcessa
